#summary How to deploy UniMRCP client and LumenVox MRCPv1 or MRCPv2 server.

==1. Overview ==
This guide describes how to deploy UniMRCP client and LumenVox MRCPv1 or MRCPv2 server. It provides typical configurations of UniMRCP client and LumenVox server, and sample network captures.
<br>
<br>

==2. Deployment ==
====Topology====
UniMRCP client allows to connect to LumenVox server. Both are on the same LAN.
<br>
<br>
